testsuite.name: all bibtex
testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: all bibtex As a member I want to view all publications i have published in format of bibtex
--Output from show all bibtex-- Scenario: show all bibtex # BibtexGenerateFile.feature:6 Given I am at the publications # ConferenciaSteps.groovy:48 When I select the export bibtex file option at the publications menu # BibtexGenerateFileSteps.groovy:5 And I select Generate All BibTex option at the export bibtex page # BibtexGenerateFileSteps.groovy:9 Then I can see the bibtex details # BibtexGenerateFileSteps.groovy:14
